Articles.Content:
For those that don't know, Saru is a planet pack consisting of a Saturn alike planet with 4 moons, using Kopernicus. 

Mission 1: 1.6 ton pathfinder probe. Took a broken plane transfer to Saru (solar orbit inject, planetary transfer from solar orbit at target planet nodal line) Small orbiter with most of the BDB science parts and lander inclusive. Currently 6y from Saru intercept. Launched on an Atlas Centaur 2-AS with a Star-37 upper stage. 

Mission 2: 2 launched 3 years after Mission 1tons of landers, 3 landers total. Same transfer as Mission 1. Duplicates of the landers on Mission 1: with minor improvements in design to make them stackable attached to an Agena upper stage. Launched on a Titan III/Transtage with 6 Castor 4 SRMS. 

Mission 3: Launched 95 days after Mission 2. Same transfer as mission 1  6.5 ton resource mapping sat on a Titan IV-C. 

I will ill be making the save(1.05) I used to make these missions available for DL soon ™. 

Modlist: 

Saru Planet Pack

Kopernicus

BDB

Scansat

Coatl Aerospace Probes+

Aies Aerospace. 

Make sure to grab the 1.05 compatible versions.

Tweakscale

Real Plume(not required for the save to load I don't think, looks pretty tho).
